ygData.subject: RE: Monk Questions
ygData.msgSnippet: I Know where the 1 spawn is, love that spot. ... From: Imari J. A. Dellimore [mailto:ijad@ee.duke.edu] Sent: Monday, September 20, 1999 2:31 PM To:
ygData.messageBody:
I Know where the 1 spawn is, love that spot.

-----Original Message-----
From: Imari J. A. Dellimore [mailto:ijad@...]
Sent: Monday, September 20, 1999 2:31 PM
To: 'EQ-Monks@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [EQ-Monks] Monk Questions


From: "Imari J. A. Dellimore" <ijad@...>

Lake rathe can last you untill level 23.
There get a small group and take over the 3 spawn island. (I was working
this spot with one other guy - we were both level 22 and he was a
paladin). Also there is a One-spwan aviak spot few people knew about back
then - just keep going past the arena ....

ahh: I found it! My old notes on lake rathe:
*rumages through some old manuscripts*

*adjusts glasses*

LOC Location:
4200,1200 Zone to South Karana
-419, 454 Vedor (never have to be overweight again!)
2410,1168 3 Aviak spawn
218 -1095 Single aviak Guard (great solo spot)
873,1032 Two aviak gaurds spawn here
-150,2800 Hiddden two spawn (hidden because you have to swim
between a mountain pass to get to teh spot. If all else is taken this spot
is usually free.

My old mind is not as good as it used to be, so if you have any questions
feel free to email me back again.

If you knew about all of these spawn sites, then I suggest you either go
to south karana and kill Harriers and rooks in a group, or head to high
pass Keep (the town inside of HIgh pass hold)

Good luck!


On Mon, 20 Sep 1999, Lombard.Mikhael wrote:

> From: "Lombard.Mikhael" <Mikhael_Lombard@...>
>
> Thanks, where else is a good place, I have been living in LAke Rathe for
the
> last couple commercials.

> From: Imari J. A. Dellimore [mailto:ijad@...]

> To: 'EQ-Monks@onelist.com'
> Subject: RE: [EQ-Monks] Monk Questions

> From: "Imari J. A. Dellimore" <ijad@...>
>
> At level 21 you would be a near the level of an Avo hunting group - bear
> in mind avocets range up to level 30 or so. So a good levle to group to
> get em is levle 25 or so. However in a well balanced group wehre you are
> one of the lower memebrs, youcould probably take down avo's - just be
> sure the puller kows what he is doing - pulling more than one will likely
> cause a great deal of hurt....
>

>
